alert.note: Alert for Caroline (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 4:04AM EST until further notice by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed to Minor severity for the following rivers in Virginia... Mattaponi River at Bowling Green affecting Caroline County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Mattaponi River at Bowling Green. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Paige Road, about 1/2 mile west of the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 AM EST Thursday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:45 AM EST Thursday was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.7 feet on 06/01/1971. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 400 PM EST.
